TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. It's a Chernobyl sheep, and attack you with its mutant talons.

I wish the next poster died immediately after reading this.
Granted! Your computer is now antimatter and I don't die!

No wish given. The wishmaking fairy assumes you wish to die and grants that wish immediately.

I wish to be a god of electronics.

Yes, a god WITH electronics running through it.

I wish to have Mudkips follow me wherever I go.

Granted. They stalk you, send you spams, computer viruses and evil SMS's.

I wish there was no mudkips.

Granted. Then I appear from Hoenn and proceed to enslave you.

I wish I could be good at KSP.

Granted. He is now attached to a big lead that nobody can remove.

I wish that coding was as simple as thinking and compiling.

EDIT: Ninja'd

Granted! The only coding on the planet is javascript!

I wish Mudkips existed.

Yes, and as before, I enjoy enslaving people.

I wish I could have a cabin on Laythe.

Granted. But you have no way of getting there from earth and pay $1M each year as taxes for it (these space lands are expensive, aren't they)?

I wish for my very own rich evil corporation.

Granted! But you are at the Flareon Farm on Laythe which is where me and 130113 Flareons live.

We also will spy on you like the freaking NSA.

I wish Laythe was more habitable

EDIT: I was talking to trout
To JebKerboom: The secret HQ is made of antimatter

Flare, you forgot to give your wish AGAIN.

The wishmaking fairy suicides when you don't tell her what you want.

I wish I could taunt stupid people whenever i want and wherever i want.

Granted! You die instantly

I wish to rule Squad

The wishmaking fairy doesn't get your message. Oh well.

I wish that the stardroid Pluto (this guy: http://megaman.wikia.com/wiki/Pluto ) lived with me.

Granted. But he gets the Maverick Virus instantly!

Have fun!

I wish to live on Europa! With a Spacesuit. and oxygen.

Granted, but micrometeorites make holes in your suit.

I wish for body armor.

Granted But It is made of Antimatter so It instantly destroys the continent you are on.

I wish to be a Kerbal.

Granted, Jeb's your pilot.

I wish for antimatter

Granted! You drop the container and destroy Earth.

I wish I farted

Granted. It's so powerful that you disintegrate.

ERLARPPRSPARFGASe

granted, you cease to exist

i wish that Jupiter was inhabited by an advanced sentient race of beings that are capable of space travel and are very peaceful (as in they abhor the idea of violence)

Granted! They nuke all our stuph. Cause "Peaceful" isn't in my dictonary.

I wish for 5 wishes

Granted. You now have 5 wishes, each for your own death. You cannot change them.

I wish Laythe was more habitable.

Granted! But since my Flareon Army lives on Laythe we are gonna kill u.

While this song is playing.

I wish 4 stuph
